channel.title: Distrelec Jira
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7994] PL - Checkout broken
item.description: Checkout step 2 is shown as empty page. B2B, B2C & Guest customers cannot checkout.
item.summary: PL - Checkout broken

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Problem with the date format in Poland.
Fixed temporarily on P.
Fix commited also...to be tested after the next deployment.

I've found the problem in the wrapper log.

==> wrapper-20151021.log <==
INFO   | jvm 1    | main    | 2015/10/21 17:43:34.460 | Oct 21, 2015 5:43:34 PM org.apache.catalina.core.ApplicationDispatcher invoke
INFO   | jvm 1    | main    | 2015/10/21 17:43:34.460 | SEVERE: Servlet.service() for servlet jsp threw exception
INFO   | jvm 1    | main    | 2015/10/21 17:43:34.460 | java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Illegal pattern character 'r'
INFO   | jvm 1    | main    | 2015/10/21 17:43:34.460 | 	at java.text.SimpleDateFormat.compile(SimpleDateFormat.java:845)
INFO   | jvm 1    | main    | 2015/10/21 17:43:34.461 | 	at java.text.SimpleDateFormat.applyPattern(SimpleDateFormat.java:2199)
INFO   | jvm 1    | main    | 2015/10/21 17:43:34.461 | 	at org.apache.taglibs.standard.tag.common.fmt.FormatDateSupport.doEndTag(FormatDateSupport.java:164)

@Rene Haemmerli | Distrelec: the strange thing is that I created a MessageEntry in the HMC when I started debugging this issue to change this date format, however, this did not fix the problem and still have blank checkout detail page.

DB messages are disable by default

# disable DB based messages by default
com.namics.hybris.i18n.useDbMessageSource=false

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7971] Additional filters popping up after a search
item.description:
Both on the web-shop (P) and in the back-end some additional filters pop-up without having anything to choose.
ex.
http://www.distrelec.it/search?q=spina+volante
In Fact Finder the products seem to have data for those attributes that do not work on the shop, check A & B are in mm, but they are converted into m, could it have some relation to ticket 79222?
item.summary: Additional filters popping up after a search

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Can you have a look at this please? Thanks

sent email to mr Türk to clarify why this happens after upgrade to 6.11 -> its reproducable on P. but looks better on Q: http://10.191.21.143:8080/FACT-Finder-6.11/Search.ff?sid=32913C5D5910CD161C3B0EB817BCAA24&site=demoshop&productsPerPage=0&channel=distrelec_Q_7330_it_it&query=spina+volante&x=0&y=0 / http://test.distrelec.it/search?q=spina+volante
waiting for an answer from mr türk

filters are working on Q with customClasses.jar v1.2: http://test.distrelec.ch/de/komponenten/steckverbinder/sub-komponenten/sub-steckverbinder/miniatur-steckverbinder-centronic/c/cat-DC-847?q=*&filter_productFamilyCode=cat-DC-847

http://test.distrelec.it/search?q=spina+volante
Only one filter "o cavo" is not working, this filter is also empty in FF backend. Mr Türk is checking why...

Hallo Herr Spalinger,
danke für das weitere Beispiel.
Bislang wurden die Drop-Down Filtergruppen auf Basis des gefilterten, finalen Suchergebnis gebildet. Da die detaillierten Filtergruppen – sprich nach Hinzufügen eines Drop-Down Filters – jedoch auf einer verkürzten Ergebnisbasis gebildet werden, ergaben sich die Unterschiede.
Mit dem Patch in der "fff-customClasses-distrelec-1.3.jar" (unter https://share.omikron.net/index.php/s/d8bc0b831efb8c73f38a49ae6ba34598 mit Passwort "ffdistrelec") wird es gelöst, d.h. die Facette wird dem Shop erst gar nicht zum Nachladen angeboten, sodass er auch keine leere Facette – weil nichts zurückkommt – einblenden wird.
Beste Grüße
Gebriyel Türk
FACT-Finder Project Development

Bessere Suche - mehr Erfolg

Omikron Data Quality GmbH
Habermehlstraße 17
75172 Pforzheim
Germany
I will deploy the patch customClasses.jar v1.3 to Q

Fixed on Q with customClasses.jar v1.3 from FF: http://test.distrelec.it/search?q=spina+volante

please test.

thx
Will
Tested on Q and it's all working!

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7889] Catalog browse redesign - fixes
item.description:
Please fix everything as mentioned in the word document.

Additionally please change the manufacturer page template so that the navigation is on the right
item.summary: Catalog browse redesign - fixes

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
All done except this part, which is a bit tricky:

Further changes on the categories
• If we use ellipsis within one box, change line-height to 22px (only for these)
• If we use ellipsis, move the arrow button up to the top (same as one liners)
• If we use ellipsis, add one pixel to the height of the box to compensate the missing line in between
• If we use ellipsis, move up the sublevel and align it to the top
Please test
Looks fine on Q

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7995] Use also ZN00 prices on productdetail
item.summary: Use also ZN00 prices on productdetail

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
found the issue in ProductVolumePricesPopulator.java:

We should use:
getDistCommercePriceService().getScaledPriceInformations(productModel);

instead of:
getDistCommercePriceService().getScaledPriceInformations(productModel, false);
Fixed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7922] Wrong display of filters
item.description:
• the Price filter title looks broken, The Filter name comes from Fact Finder, where we have the correct name "Price" in each language.
  • The filter "Length" does not correspond to the filter on the product, check screenshot 1 (http://jira.distrelec.com/secure/thumbnail/20726/_thumb_20726.png) In Fact Finder we are getting the data in mm, and a conversion is taking place. It is the same issue in all shops (Not sure if related to the migration)
item.summary: Wrong display of filters

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: had a call with Mr Türk and sent a mail with the screenshots to him. He will check it now
price filter issue solved on P

Hallo Herr Spalinger,
die Umsetzung hat glücklicherweise vorzeitig erfolgen können.
Die Legacy-Lösung steht unter https://share.omikron.net/index.php/s/d8bc0b831efb8c73f38a49ae6ba34598 (Passwort: ffdistrelec) in Form einer neuen JAR-Datei zum Abruf bereit. Es braucht lediglich der Master-Server, der die Importe ausführt, neugestartet werden.
Bitte platzieren Sie in der Konfiguration fff.properties anstelle von
fff-customClasses-distrelec-current.jar!/extendedUnifyAttributeUnitsImportHandler
die folgende Zeile
fff-customClasses-distrelec-current.jar!/legacyUnifyAttributeUnitsImportHandler
Nach dem Datenimport und dem Neuladen der Konfigurationen (http://10.191.20.145:8080/FACT-Finder/Configurator.ff?do=flushConfiguration) wird die gewohnte Darstellungsweise wiederhergestellt sein.

Beste Grüße
Gebriyel Türk
FACT-Finder Project Development

Deployed new jar to Q. Display is now as excepted to be: http://test.distrelec.ch/de/werkzeuge-messtechnik/werkzeuge/handwerkzeuge/bits/c/cat-L3D_525410 but filter "Länge" is not working anymore. need to check why

we have an issue, if you open (the url call from ajax) http://test.distrelec.ch/de/werkzeuge-messtechnik/werkzeuge/handwerkzeuge/bits/c/cat-L3D_525410?q=*&useTechnicalView=true&pageSize=10&requestType=ajax&filter_Category3=Handwerkzeuge&filter_L%E4nge~~mm=30&filter_Category4=Bits you get:

The requested URL was rejected. Please consult with your administrator.

Your support ID is: 10533611291503284692

Hi Marek

I have an issue with an url called by ajax in a facet: http://test.distrelec.ch/de/werkzeuge-messtechnik/werkzeuge/handwerkzeuge/bits/c/cat-L3D_525410?q=*&useTechnicalView=true&pageSize=10&requestType=ajax&filter_Category3=Handwerkzeuge&filter_L%E4nge~~mm=30&filter_Category4=Bits

Opening this url results in:

The requested URL was rejected. Please consult with your administrator.

Your support ID is: 10533611291504588865

Could you please tell me what the issue is here?

Thank you very much.

BR
Will

Hello Wilhelm.
There is problem with conversion of some characters:
Failed to convert character violation details
Context Parameter (detected in Query String)
Parameter Name filter_L�nge~~mm
Buffer filter_L�nge~~mm

Best Regards,

-------------------------------------------
Marek Hrasko

Open filter link in a new tab is working as expected, the url is not rejected: http://test.distrelec.ch/de/werkzeuge-messtechnik/werkzeuge/handwerkzeuge/bits/c/cat-L3D_525410?q=*&filter_Category4=Bits&filter_Category3=Handwerkzeuge&filter_L%C3%A4nge~~mm=30

Only the ajax call is not working, because it changes the spelling of the filter parameter to &filter_L%E4nge~mm=30 which is not working but this parameter is working &filter_L%C3%A4nge~mm=30

After deployment of this fix, we need to change the customClasses.jar to:

lrwxrwxrwx 1 hybris hybris   45 Oct 16 14:22 fff-customClasses-distrelec-current.jar -> versioned/fff-customClasses-distrelec-1.2.jar
Please test after the next deployment

Not sure if directly related with the previous problem, but now the filters in the screenshot (http://jira.distrelec.com/secure/attachment/20868/2015-10-22%2016_10_33-Buy%20Bits%20_%20Distrelec%20Switzerland.png) can't be selected.
Problem exists only in Q CH EN channel right?

check http://test.distrelec.ch/de/werkzeuge-messtechnik/werkzeuge/handwerkzeuge/bits/c/cat-L3D_525410 filter length / Länge. if you open it in a new tab, its working as expected but its not working if you just select it.
Looks fine on Q

I had so far no findings. First suspected SAP to be the problem.

I could reproduce it ones on P but not on Q or local.

@Akshay

Can you please check on this.
Is is a very important ticket.

Thanks

Hi Rene/Sebastian,

I have tested this issue in Local/QA/Production. It's working fine. May be it was performance/network issue.
Can you please request the user to try one more time.

Thanks,
Akshay

Hello Akshay

Like discussed on Lync.
Please import the product-data on Q and test again.

I could reproduce this issues once on P, so I know it exists.
Can you please, propose a performance optimisation of this import.
(maybe is has something to do the the reference field)

this issue is mainly caused by the OnlinePriceCalculation, on this page we do not require the online price since we use the volume prices. I explained to Akshay how to remove this call.

BR,
/Nabil.

@Rafael

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7837] Update the Q & P system with latest warehouse configuration
item.description:
Reconfigure the warehouse for all elfa countries based on the following wiki page.

http://wiki.distrelec.com/display/distrelint/ERP+Codelist+-+DistSalesOrg
item.summary: Update the Q & P system with latest warehouse configuration

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Development has been done!!
All the scripts has been updated and impex file too. I have reconfigured the warehouse manualy on P & Q system.

Results can be seen here too http://wiki.distrelec.com/display/distrelint/Warehouse+configuration+-+production

It seems the stock is still not displayed in the shop.
Example for DE shop:
30019168;EF51;53;20151009;0;20151008070045
Example for PL shop:
11061592;ES71;64;20151011;0;20151008070045
11061592;ES71;1338;20151018;0;20151008070045

This Information was sent at 11:24 today morning in the file: erp_stock-20151008112314061.csv_20151008122316021

Could you check this, please?

Hello Urs Bebie | Distrelec

When I checked on the webshop I found the same information present of the webshop for example see this:-

Stock for 30019168
But when I check the shop, no stock is displayed. See screenshots.

Hi Urs Bebie | Distrelec :-
Yes you are right. I too can see the same on the shop. It has wrong availability information on flyout.

This means we have correct stock level in hybris, but the display logic is not correct some how.

Hello Urs Bebie | Distrelec :- I digged deep into this and figure out that stock level information is being displayed on the web by two ways.

  1. For Movex :- We are displaying the stock level based on the file send by ERP. like the one you attached with jira task.
  2. For Sap :- There is an online sap interface for this called IF06_Availability This interface is basically responsible for displaying correct stock information. The webshop is sending the list of all available warehouse and display the information which is coming as a response.

I can see the response is zero for all warehouse available in the DE shope. Here is the request & response for this article.

Request to SAP
===========

 <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:hyb="http://www.distrelec.com/hybris" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">
   <soapenv:Header/>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <hyb:AvailabilityRequest xmlns:ns2="http://www.distrelec.com/hybris">
         <salesOrganization>7350</salesOrganization>     
         <articleNumbers>30019168</articleNumbers>        
         <warehouseIds>EF51</warehouseIds>
          <warehouseIds>ES51</warehouseIds>
           <warehouseIds>7371</warehouseIds>
      </hyb:AvailabilityRequest>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

Response from SAP
===========

    <SOAP:Envelope xmlns:SOAP="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">
   <SOAP:Header/>
   <SOAP:Body xmlns:hyb="http://www.distrelec.com/hybris">
      <ns1:AvailabilityResponse xmlns:ns1="http://www.distrelec.com/hybris">
         <erpArticleAvailability>
            <articleNumber>30019168</articleNumber>
            <articleFound>true</articleFound>
            <stockLevels>
               <warehouseId>EF51</warehouseId>
               <available>0</available>
               <articleFoundInWarehouse>false</articleFoundInWarehouse>
            </stockLevels>
            <stockLevels>
               <warehouseId>ES51</warehouseId>
               <available>0</available>
               <articleFoundInWarehouse>false</articleFoundInWarehouse>
            </stockLevels>
            <stockLevels>
               <warehouseId>7371</warehouseId>
               <available>0</available>
               <articleFoundInWarehouse>true</articleFoundInWarehouse>
            </stockLevels>
         </erpArticleAvailability>
      </ns1:AvailabilityResponse>
   </SOAP:Body>
</SOAP:Envelope>

Hello Evangelos Kontopoulos | Lodestone :-

Can you please check the above request / response and figure out why we have a zero stock level for article no 30019168 for DE shop.

Thanks

Hello Neeraj,
The ES and EF codes are not ERP codes. These are custom values we use when we export the stock. These codes cannot be used in the direct requests in SAP and is only for display there.
Hi Evangelos, but even i can see zero stock for <warehouseId>7371</warehouseId> as well. is it correct ?
Neeraj, but on the overview screen also not availability is displayed and this data is not from the online Interface. See screenshot overview screen.
Hi Urs Bebie | Distrelec :- Yes for sap counties , the source of information of this " overview screen" is directly from sap interface IF06_Availability.
Hi Neeraj, are you sure that this is also online via IF06? I thought just if you go to the detailed page. If not you would never use the values we send in the stock file.
Hi Urs, Yes I confirm you this information is coming via IF06. The stock file which is send is used in case of movex country to display the availability information.

Facts:
1.Virtual warehouses cannot be used in IF06
2. Webshop calls IF06 in the detail page, and during the cart calculation
3.Stock for direct shipment products is not hold in standard SAP tables and IF06 always returns 0 stock
4.Information shown is incorrect for these articles.
Solution:
There is a need for a CR which will show the stock for these type of articles. There are two options to achieve this
1. CR on SAP side: A new method needs to be built type IF06 and whenever there are these virtual warehouses included EF* or ES* the method will have to check the same custom tables as it is used in IF03.
2. CR on the Webshop side: When stock is included in the EF* or ES* warehouses then no call should be done in SAP and instead show stock loaded from IF03 directly in HMC.

Performance issues need to be considered for taking the decision.
Evangelos and Neeraj to provide the effort estimation for each of the two possible CRs

@Neeraj, @Evangelos

Performance issues need to be considered for taking the decision.

What are your concerns?

Evangelos and Neeraj to provide the effort estimation for each of the two possible CRs

Please provide estimations.

Thanks
René

In the IF06 we are using a standard BAPI for showing the stock for the standard SAP tables. Now we have to make a custom call which will read the custom table select and sum the stock quantities from the different vendors which are "translated" to ES* and EF* warehouses. This may take some time but I will have to cross check with my dev team.

Challenges in webshop side:-
========================
1. We don't have information on the warehouse level if it is a real or virtual
2. Assuming that we configured missing information at point 1. We will have to adapt the interface for the information coming from IF06 interface.
3. In the if06 call we will have to check the stock level inside the hybris for all virtual warehouse, by looking into the database.
4. I don't have the real time estimation how much cost effective is to look this into database, but we will have to do this on productdetails page also on the cart page.
5. In my opinion and I believe the product detail page is the most visited page and we have already a performance issue with the page with long loading time and addition of this logic could also add some more extra time to render.
6. For all soap call in webshop side we have some types of cache and if we have the information available into cache we avoid to make a real webshop call.

How ever I am still analysis the complexity and areas of changes on the webshop side.

Thanks

Effort is 1,5 days DEV plus 1 day for me for documentation and testing.
My dev team mentioned that performance shouldnt be affected a lot.

Hello guys,
The development is in Q now. Unfortunately I cannot test without your help as I need to see the request and the response. Can we somehow do that tomorrow?
According to Evangelos, this is solved.
Hi Evangelos, can you verify if this works?
As just discussed it is not working.
I adjusted the warehouse configuration for all SAP countries.

attachment.name: RE Warehouses and delivery times on the Webshop.msg
attachment.author: nshandilya

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7718] Datepicker issues
item.description:
It is not possible to select a date with the datepicker.

If the desired delivery date is entered via keyboard to the input field, then the correct value is transmitted.
item.summary: Datepicker issues

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Estimation needed(if possible) - This is part of the sprint. Thanks!

Hi Rafael,
You have a user to test please?
I tried to register but it's impossible:

ERROR: "Organizational ID number is not valid"

even if I introduce it correcly: 8 digits
Hi Ruben, please use one of those accounts: http://wiki.distrelec.com/display/distrelint/Test+Accounts

it needs deep investigation. The date-picker is basically doing whatever it wants :/
I would say 5h FE
Ok, please do so, thx.

All the future dates are not clickable because the BackEnd values minRequestedDeliveryDate and maxRequestedDeliveryDate are the same (see attachment)
The JSP affected is checkout-delivery-date.jsp

Neeraj Shandilya | Distrelec Can you have a look to the BE please?
Thanks
Akshay Agrawal | Cognizant :- Could you please take care of this. Thanks

Hi Ruben,

Dates are coming fine from Background code. This issue is coming from checkout-delivery-date.skin.checkout.js file. If we use shop language english then it's working fine but same will fail in other languages.
For reference, Please see the attachment.

Thanks,
Akshay

Hi Akshay,

I've discovered something. The dates values are different form Denmark-English and Denmark-Danish (see atachments)

These dates values are coming from the Backend. "minRequestedDeliveryDate" and "maxRequestedDeliveryDate".
Can you check why these date formats are different for the same country?

Get back to me for whatever you need.
Thanks
Dates must be always in this format: mm/dd/yy

Similiar problem found in Sweden:

Sweden EN: OK
Sweden SE: NOK

(see attachments)

Hi Ruben,

From Backend side we are sending you the date object. Using Format tag library and based on language we are setting the format date.
For ex.
<fmt:formatDate var="deliveryDate" value="$

{cartData.reqDeliveryDateHeaderLevel}" dateStyle="short" />

If you can change in that library then this issue can be resolved. Or we can apply pattern in the same tag through which we can solve this problem.
for ex.
<fmt:formatDate var="sDateMin" value="${minRequestedDeliveryDate}" dateStyle="short" pattern="MM/dd/yy"/>
<fmt:formatDate var="sDateMax" value="${maxRequestedDeliveryDate}" dateStyle="short" pattern="MM/dd/yy"/>
<fmt:formatDate var="deliveryDate" value="${cartData.reqDeliveryDateHeaderLevel}

" dateStyle="short" pattern="MM/dd/yy"/>

Thanks,
Akshay

Ok, I will force the correct pattern in the Front End.
However, we should also check why this format is wrong in the Back End.

Date and time notation in Sweden

In Sweden, the ISO 8601 standard is closely followed in most written Swedish. Dates are generally and officially written for example "2006-12-31", but the older forms "31/12 2006" or "31/12 -06" are frequently seen informally.

Date and time notation in Norway

Norway uses two date systems:
1 - D.MM.YYYY (e.g., 24.12.2006 for Christmas Eve, or 1.5.2006 for Labour Day) is by far the most common system, and is the one recommended by the Language Council of Norway. Dots are the most common separator, although you still see slash and hyphen (especially in handwriting): 24/12-2005.
2 - YYYY-MM-DD (the ISO 8601-standard) is used to some extent in official documents and in computer related materials.

Date and time notation in Finland

The all-numeric form for dates is in the order “day month year”, using a period as the separator. Example: “31.5.2002” or “31.5.02”. Years can be written with two or four digits, and numbers may be written with or without leading zero.

We will use this format for all shops: yyyy-mm-dd

(source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Date_and_time_notation_in_Sweden)

Applies as well to:

  • SE, DE, FI
Please test

Testing results Q:

  • OK: SE, FI, PL,
  • NOK: DK, DE, NO

Testing results on P:

  • OK: NL,
  • NOK: DE, LT, DK, EE, LV
New fixes commited.

UPDATE: In P, Poland the datepicker is as well not working.

  • Dateformat for PL: "day month year".

Verified on Q:

  • OK: DE, DK, LT, PL EE

Not possible to test on Q: LT

@Rafael

This is already on P.
Please close or reopen.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7610] Add CMS component to manufacturer pages
item.description: As an immediate and very important request from Neil (…on the basis of the obvious intention of “not sending our traffic away from our webshop”), we need to remove all outbound links from our manufacturer pages. Currently we have no control over these pages. Therefore, I hereby request that all these outbound links are removed ASAP and we are given control of the component of these manufacturer pages to enrich the content and SEO potential of these.
item.summary: Add CMS component to manufacturer pages

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7465] Suggest function in FF campaign backend not working according to settings
item.description:
In the FF campaign backend, the suggest function does not work as set. I.e. we get duplicates, a different order and not all categories/brands/searches as suggestions.

In the backend search as well as on the shop, all this works. As without a functioning suggest we cannot properly setup the campaigns, we need a fix for this.

Thanks.
item.summary: Suggest function in FF campaign backend not working according to settings

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
@Will

Can you please check

vielen Dank für Ihre FACT-Finder Supportanfrage, wir werden diese schnellstmöglich für Sie bearbeiten.

Bei Rückfragen und im weiteren Mailverkehr zu Ihrer Anfrage antworten Sie uns bitte auf diese oder künftige E-Mails direkt. Bitte achten Sie dabei darauf, dass die Ticketnummer 2015092811000464 im Betreff der E-Mail stehen bleibt. Über diesen Weg wird die Korrespondenz zu einem Fall automatisch zugeordnet.

Unsere Supportzeiten sind Montag bis Freitag, 8 - 18 Uhr (außer an Feiertagen von Baden-Württemberg).

Mit freundlichen Grüßen
Ihr FACT-Finder Support Team

Wir würden gerne, wenn das auch von Ihrer Seite passt, dass jetzt kommende Update auf 6.11 abwarten. Wie hier erfahren habe, ist des Weiteren ja auch die Nutzung neuer Hardware geplant. Ich denke, dass die angesprochene Problematik damit behoben sein sollte.

André Beyer
FACT-Finder Support

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6484] All ELFA Q & P sites// Evo Payment configurations //Capture Pay SSL = AUTO becomes Capture Pay SSL = MANUAL
item.description:
The requirement from the Webshop side is that the message [1]https://spg.evopayments.eu/pay/payssl.aspx that they send has currently Capture Pay SSL = AUTO

This has to be changed to Capture Pay SSL = MANUAL.


Action point before set live: -
For paypal payment when you change capture=manual, then it is mandatory to add <Txtype> parameter. Hence this add as a action point to configure the paypal MID to support
this additional parameter. Otherwise payment will be decline.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[1] https://spg.evopayments.eu/pay/payssl.aspx
item.summary: All ELFA Q & P sites// Evo Payment configurations //Capture Pay SSL = AUTO becomes Capture Pay SSL = MANUAL

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Oana,
Please give us more information for this task.

request from business to capture sums at Evo payments only when the bills are being created.

This led to a CR at SAP end.

This leads to this change in the shop.

Hi Oana,

I understood your point that you want to change parameter Capture= AUTO to MANUAL.
But here I have a question. Do you want to change it for all kind of payment using EvoPayment ?. Like creditCardPayment / directDebit / PayPalPayment

creditCardPayment / PayPalPayment

In case of PayPal please keep in mind that the additional parameter <Txtype> becomes mandatory when setting parameter capture to MANUAL through URL "https://spg.evopayments.eu/pay/paypal.aspx.".

Reverted back all the changes
